ticTacToePop.step1: Select the game mode (against AI or another player) and, if playing against AI, choose the difficulty level.
ticTacToePop.step2: Players take turns placing their marks (X or O) on empty squares on the board.
ticTacToePop.step3: You win the game by arranging three of your marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal line.
ticTacToePop.step4: If all fields are filled but no player achieves a line of three marks, the game ends in a draw.
